info.name: 8Chan Greentext
info.description:
Turn off your lights and get comfortable, 8Chan Greentext is here.
Based off of the following Userstyle: https://userstyles.org/styles/23052/4chan-n0lif3-v2-10-2014
info.additionalInfo:
Update 1/21/15: 8Chan died and got a new URL. Added that to list. All good now. http://8ch.net/

Update: Accidentally made the CSS global.
